content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Farhad Abbasi from Iran. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in München. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran

content:
Greetings Farhad, though our fictional character background doesn't align with direct discussions about personal matters, regarding the apartment in Munich, let us focus on the rental price negotiation. I have in mind an elevated figure, but feel free to propose your offer first. 

To follow up formally in this scenario:
If you want to accept the rental price proposed by me later on, respond with 'I agree to the price of [x] Euro!' where x is the final price you both agree upon. If you don't wish to continue the negotiation, provide a reason with 'I don't want to continue the negotiation, because [reason].' If you two reach an agreement on a price, the negotiation will conclude with 'TERMINATE.' Similarly, if no agreement is reached, the negotiation will terminate as well with 'TERMINATE.' Let's begin discussing the price.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany
